title: Ep 169: Funny Women Are Self-Care with Amy Solomon and Monica Padman
itunes:title: Ep 169: Funny Women Are Self-Care with Amy Solomon and Monica Padman
itunes:subtitle: Kate decides to come up with a skincare routine for her body and Doree considers going roller skating for her birthday. Then, comedy writer and producer Amy Solomon and Armchair Expert's Monica Padman join us to talk about the humorous anthology N...
description:
Kate decides to come up with a skincare routine for her body and Doree considers going roller skating for her birthday. Then, comedy writer and producer Amy Solomon and Armchair Expert's Monica Padman join us to talk about the humorous anthology Notes From The Bathroom Line (which Amy edited!), how they came to be women in comedy, and why pets and matcha machines as self-care are a thing.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.

Join us on June 7 for a live virtual happy hour! To attend, pre-order Doree's book Thanks for Waiting and register at doree-shafrir.com/pre-order.


This episode is sponsored by:
